document_data.name: ''Sentinel''
document_data.mainbody:
{{Quote|''"From the Heavens? Nay, from my hammer"''|[[Huffum Fuiruim]]}}
'''''Sentinel''''' was an [[Item enchantment|enchanted]] [[medium shield]] that originated from the [[Sword Coast]].
document_data.Description: This shield was forged from [[star metal]].<ref group="note">While the in-game description does not use this term, ''star metal'' refers to "leftover material from the impact of an object fallen from space". As such it was exceptionally lightweight, weighing only 3 pounds (1.4 kilograms).
document_data.History:
One day during the mid–13{{th}} century [[DR]], a comet from [[Realmspace]] landed on [[Toril]] on the [[Sword Coast|coast]] of [[west Faerûn]]. A few days later the blacksmith [[Huffum Fuiruim]] encountered the crash site and gathered the pieces of metal he found. He used them to forge the magical shield called ''Sentinel''.

At some point during or before the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, the shield came into the possession of a [[drow]] merchant that operated within the city of [[Ust Natha]].
